metadata.title: CVE-2018-16877 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way pacemaker's client-server authentication wasimplemented in versions up to and including 2.0.0. A local attacker coulduse this flaw, and combine it with other IPC weaknesses, to achieve localprivilege escalation.

criterions.comment: pacemaker: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
